name: ENEWETAK/UJELANG LOCAL GOVERNMENT
description: A local government unit in the Republic of the Marshall Islands.
sampleDescriptions: Contact with Senate Appropriations Committee, House Appropriations Committee, and Senate Energy Committee re supplemental appropriation for Enewetak Food and Agriculture Program.
Inquired as to suitability of proposed excavator grant for technical assistance and operations and maintenance grant programs.

Inquired as to procedures for disbursing Food and Agriculture Program grant funds. Requested a return to previous system where client's grants were disbursed directly and not through the national gove
Inclusion in climate change bill of study on how to redress environmental impacts on Enewetak of U.S. nuclear testing program.
